connector.description:
Consume messages from Google Cloud Pub/Sub.

If you specify the `serviceAccountKey` property, you must base64 encode it before you pass it as a parameter.

camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.proje.name: camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.projectId
camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.proje.description: The Google Cloud Pub/Sub Project ID.

camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.servi.name: camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.serviceAccountKey
camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.servi.description: The service account key to use as credentials for the Pub/Sub publisher/subscriber. You must encode this value in base64.

camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.synch.name: camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.synchronousPull
camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.synch.description: Specifies to synchronously pull batches of messages.

camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.maxMe.name: camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.maxMessagesPerPoll
camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.maxMe.description: The maximum number of messages to receive from the server in a single API call.

camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.concu.name: camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.concurrentConsumers
camel.kamelet.google-pubsub-source.concu.description: The number of parallel streams to consume from the subscription.
